main event: A local resident reported observing a bright, disc-shaped object maneuvering silently at high speed over Atlanta, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 50 feet in diameter.,It emitted a bright, glowing light that illuminated the surrounding area.,The object performed rapid, erratic maneuvers including sharp turns and abrupt changes in altitude.,No sound or exhaust was observed coming from the object.,An official inquiry was launched by local authorities after the sighting.
witness description: Mr. John Smith, a local resident
